attributes.action: Protect British Consumers from Equifax Data Breach
attributes.background: The US credit rating firm Equifax states it holds the personal details of 44 million UK citizens but many British victims will be unaware they have had details stolen as they will not directly be Equifax customers.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
